name: Kaltvik General Hospital
text:
You wake up to the rhythm of a beeping monitor. The ceiling tiles are stained water-yellow. Your body feels distant, cotton-wrapped. 

A nurse checks your charts. 'You're lucky to be alive,' she mutters. 'Whatever hit you... it wasn't human.'

You've lost time. The world has moved on while you slept.

objects.monitor: It pulses with a green line. Evidence that you are still here.
objects.shrine: A small collection of withered flowers on the bedside table. No card.
